title: [Extension Proposal] - Mongock MongoDB database migrations during Quarkus startup

labels.name: area/quarkiverse
labels.description: This issue/PR is part of the Quarkiverse organization

body:
### Description

Hey, just build an extension at work using mongock v5 (https://mongock.io) and could provide it towards quarkiverse / quarkusio if there is any interest.

it needs bit of polishing I guess, that said it contains basic health checks and config params to enable/disable the whole extension and its health checks. 

For now it supports the default MongoDB client (not multi tenant, yet) and uses an underlying MongoDB sync driver for doing so.

Since it's my first official extension offered/proposed some review / feedback round would be appreciated. ðŸ˜„ 

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).

### Repository name

quarkus-mongodb-mongock

### Short description

Allows mongock database migrations for MongoDB to be executed during Quarkus startup

### Repository Homepage URL

https://quarkiverse.github.io/quarkiverse-docs/quarkus-mongodb-mongock/dev/

### Repository Topics

- quarkus-extension
- mongodb
- mongock
- database migration

### Team Members

@janknobloch 



### Additional context

_No response_
